author: Elizabeth Adetula For Metro.Co.Uk
title: EastEnders legend June Brown's 90th birthday ‚Äì watch this amazing tribute | Metro News
text:
Elizabeth Adetula for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 2:48 pm June Brown has starred on EastEnders since 1985 (Picture: BBC) 
EastEnders legend Dot Cotton celebrates her 90th birthday and the tributes are pouring in. Sponsored 13 realities of going wedding dress shopping 
June Brown, who plays EastEnders voice of reason Dot Cotton, turns 90 today as the British TV world celebrates her incredible acting career. 
The BBC have paid tribute to the actress on her 90th, with an amazing clip marking her incredible life. 
The 90-year-old soap icon joined the cast of Albert Square in 1985 when it started and has been on the show ever since. June Brown plays the lovable Dot Cotton (Picture: BBC) 
Before joining the cast of EastEnders, June had a short-lived stint on rival soap Coronation Street starring as Mrs Parsons, and the Manchester-based soap also paid tribute. Happy 90th birthday to soap legend June Brown. Before the @bbceastenders Square she graced the Street. Here's a look back to 1971. #Corrie pic.twitter.com/dhgqrv20nm 
‚Äî Coronation Street (@itvcorrie) February 16, 2017 
Tonight‚Äôs show in tribute to the actress will see her receive a prize from her on-screen son John Altman, AKA Nasty Nick. Happy birthday June! (Picture: BBC) 
The cast of EastEnders took to Twitter to send June some birthday love with a video, and co-stars Adam Woodyatt who plays Ian Beale and Jacqueline Jossa who stars as Lauren Branning also tweeted about the ledge. The EastEnders cast Happy happy birthday June from all the cast at #EastEnders !! üéâüéÅ A true icon. pic.twitter.com/3E4lOcbi4j 
‚Äî BBC EastEnders (@bbceastenders) February 16, 2017 Adam Woodyatt (stars as Ian Beale) Happy 90th birthday #JuneBrown You are a legend. pic.twitter.com/v1M9zy4nFQ 
‚Äî Adam Woodyatt (@AdamWoodyatt) February 16, 2017 Jacqueline Jossa (stars as Lauren Branning) Happy 90th birthday June brown ‚ù§Ô∏èwe love you so so much! @bbceastenders #legend
